document.full_text: u.s. videoconferencing company polycom inc  will buy hewlett packard co's  videoconferencing business for $89 million in cash, as it arms itself in its fight for market share against cisco systems .
document.title: polycom to buy hp videoconferencing unit for $89 million
lines_and_colors: u.s. videoconferencing company polycom inc  will buy hewlett packard co's  videoconferencing business for $89 million in cash, as it arms itself in its fight for market share against cisco systems .
